com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing

Class IndexQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.graphdb.query.BaseQuery
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.indexing.IndexQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackendQuery<IndexQuery>, Query

    public class IndexQuery
extends BaseQuery
implements BackendQuery<IndexQuery>
    An external index query executed on an IndexProvider.

    A query is comprised of the store identifier against which the query ought to be executed and a query condition which defines which entries match the query.

    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
